m_szDocTitle: ZAP Jonway Announces Roll Out Of 2013 EV Product Line
m_szDocSumamry: June 21st, 2013 by Nicholas Brown   Editor’s Note: Zap Jonway isn’t exactly the electric vehicle household name that Tesla is, but it’s rolling out 2–4 (depending on how you count) new electric vehicles this year (in China). Notably, they use lead-acid batteries. Say what? Zap Jonway , an automobile manufacturer headquartered in Santa Rosa, California, has unveiled its latest lineup of 2013 electric vehicles, including two versions of a 5-star minivan, a 3-Door E380 SUV, and a 5-Door E-Falcon SUV.
